item.title: 韩国央行认为通胀暂时保持稳定
item.description: 韩国央行周二表示，预计消费通胀将暂时保持目前的稳定趋势。【原文：South Korea's central bank said on Tuesday that consumer inflation was expected to maintain the current stable trend for the time being.】

item.title: 独家报道俄罗斯储蓄银行称，尽管受到西方制裁，印度业务仍在蓬勃发展
item.description: 俄罗斯最大的贷款机构储蓄银行（Sberbank）副首席执行官阿纳托利-波波夫（Anatoly Popov）告诉路透社记者，俄罗斯与印度的贸易正在蓬勃发展，双边支付进展顺利，没有出现阻碍与其他国家贸易的故障。【原文：Russia's trade with India is booming and bilateral payments are proceeding smoothly without the glitches that have been hampering trade with other countries, Anatoly Popov, deputy CEO of Russia's largest lender, Sberbank, told Reuters.】

item.title: 韩国通胀放缓至 3 年半低点，达到央行目标
item.description: 韩国官方数据周二显示，韩国8月份消费者通胀放缓，创下近3年半以来的最低水平，这支持了市场对韩国即将放宽货币政策的预期。【原文：South Korea's consumer inflation slowed in August to the weakest in nearly 3-1/2 years, official data showed on Tuesday, supporting market expectations for an imminent easing of monetary policy.】

item.title: 独家报道埃利奥特现在拥有的西南航空股份足以召开特别会议
item.description: 据一位熟悉此事的人士透露，埃利奥特投资管理公司目前持有西南航空公司 10% 的普通股，超过了允许对冲基金在该航空公司召开特别会议的门槛。【原文：Elliott Investment Management now holds 10% of Southwest Airlines' common stock, crossing the threshold that allows the hedge fund to call a special meeting at the carrier, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国通信工人协会退出与 AT&T 的调解
item.description: 美国通信工人协会（CWA）在周一的一份声明中表示，该协会已通知 AT&T 公司和联邦调停与和解服务机构，它将不再参与调停，因为该工会认为，该公司利用这一程序来拖延谈判。【原文：The Communications Workers of America (CWA) have informed AT&T and the Federal Mediation and Conciliation Service that it would no longer be a part of the mediation, as the union argues that the company has used this process to stall negotiations, it said in a statement on Monday.】

item.title: 新西兰数据迷雾让央行无所适从
item.description: 新西兰官方经济数据的滞后性给政策制定者带来了迷雾，迫使他们最近偏离了方向，比预计时间提前了整整一年降息，严重打错了金融市场的立足点。【原文：Lags in New Zealand's official economic data are creating a fog for policy makers that recently forced them to veer off course and cut interest rates a whole year earlier than projected, badly wrong footing financial markets.】

item.title: 通用汽车厄瓜多尔工厂永久关闭
item.description: 在当地竞争对手的压力下，通用汽车公司在厄瓜多尔的工厂将于周五停产，但仍将在这个安第斯国家销售汽车。【原文：General Motors' factory in Ecuador will shutter production on Friday amid pressure from local competitors, but will still sell vehicles in the Andean country.】

item.title: 宝马在全球召回 Mini Cooper SE 电动车型
item.description: 德国汽车制造商宝马公司发言人周一告诉路透社，由于电池出现问题，该公司正在召回电动Mini Cooper SE汽车，全球可能有超过14万辆汽车受到影响。【原文：German automaker BMW is recalling electric Mini Cooper SE vehicles due to problems in their batteries, which could potentially affect more than 140,000 autos worldwide, a company spokesperson told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 如果收入不足，巴西政府考虑对大型科技公司征税
item.description: 巴西财政部周一表示，如果财政收入出现缺口，将在今年下半年向国会提交提案，对大型科技公司征税，并对跨国公司实施 15% 的全球最低税率，以确保实现 2025 年的财政目标。【原文：Brazil's Finance Ministry said on Monday that if there is a shortfall in revenue, it will submit proposals to Congress in this year's second half to tax big tech companies and implement a global minimum tax of 15% on multinational corporations to secure the 2025 fiscal goal.】

item.title: Blackstone 收购 12 亿美元欧洲物流基金股份
item.description: 私募股权投资巨头 Blackstone 已同意收购由房东 Burstone 经营的欧洲仓库投资组合 80% 的股份，这是该美国投资管理公司进军随着电子商务兴起而蓬勃发展的仓库领域的最新举措。【原文：Private equity giant Blackstone has agreed to buy an 80% stake in a European warehouse portfolio run by landlord Burstone , the latest push by the U.S. investment manager into warehouses that have boomed alongside the rise of e-commerce.】

item.title: 星链》成为马斯克与巴西之间的新战场
item.description: 在巴西最高法院支持禁止社交网络 X 进入巴西的争议性决定数小时后，巴西电信监管机构威胁要制裁埃隆-马斯克的卫星宽带公司 Starlink，这进一步加剧了巴西与埃隆-马斯克商业帝国之间的紧张关系。【原文：Tensions between Brazil and Elon Musk's business empire ratcheted up further as the country's telecoms regulator threatened to sanction his satellite broadband company Starlink hours after its top court stood behind a controversial decision to ban social network X from the country.】

item.title: 国泰航空公司发现 A350 机队发动机部件故障后进行检查
item.description: 香港国泰航空公司（Cathay Pacific Airways）周一表示，在发现一架空客A350飞机的发动机部件出现故障后，该公司已开始对整个机队进行检查，作为一项预防措施。【原文：Hong Kong's Cathay Pacific Airways said on Monday it had started a fleet-wide inspection of its Airbus A350 aircraft as a precautionary measure after it identified an engine component failure in one of its flights.】

item.title: 惠普将继续审理迈克-林奇索赔 40 亿美元的案件
item.description: 惠普公司周一表示，将继续进行法律诉讼，向英国亿万富翁迈克-林奇在英国的遗产寻求高达 40 亿美元的赔偿。【原文：Hewlett Packard said on Monday it would continue legal proceedings to seek up to $4 billion in damages from British billionaire Mike Lynch's estate in the UK.】

item.title: 星链公司告诉巴西监管机构，它不会遵守 X 暂停的规定
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）控制的卫星互联网服务提供商 Starlink 已告知巴西电信监管机构 Anatel，在社交媒体平台 X 的本地账户解冻之前，该公司不会遵守法院关于在巴西封禁该平台的命令。【原文：Elon Musk-controlled satellite internet provider Starlink has told Brazil's telecom regulator Anatel it will not comply with a court order to block social media platform X in the country until its local accounts are unfrozen.】

item.title: 巴西第二季度经济有望稳健增长
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查预测，与今年前三个月相比，巴西上一季度的经济在家庭支出的支撑下保持了稳健增长。【原文：Brazil's economy kept growing at a solid pace last quarter compared to the first three months of the year, supported by household expenditure, a Reuters poll predicted.】

item.title: 大众汽车为削减成本考虑关闭历史性的德国工厂
item.description: 大众汽车首次考虑关闭在德国的工厂，此举表明这家欧洲顶级汽车制造商正面临着来自亚洲廉价竞争的压力。【原文：Volkswagen is considering closing factories in Germany for the first time, in a move that shows the pressure Europe's top carmaker is facing from cheap Asian competition.】

item.title: 特斯拉中国制造电动汽车 8 月销量同比增长 3
item.description: 中国乘用车联席会（CPCA）周一公布的数据显示，8月份美国汽车制造商特斯拉在中国生产的电动汽车销量同比增长3%。【原文：Sales of U.S. automaker Tesla's China-made electric vehicles grew 3% in August from a year earlier, data from the China Passenger Car Association (CPCA) showed on Monday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，ByteDance 向银行申请 95 亿美元的亚洲美元企业贷款
item.description: 两位知情人士周一透露，TikTok 的所有者 ByteDance 正在向银行申请一笔 95 亿美元的贷款，这将是除日本以外亚洲最大的美元企业融资。【原文：TikTok-owner ByteDance is tapping banks for a $9.5 billion loan that would be the biggest dollar-denominated corporate facility in Asia ex-Japan, two sources with knowledge of the matter said on Monday.】

item.title: 受人工智能成本和经济衰退担忧影响，科技股市值下跌；礼来和伯克希尔上涨
item.description: 由于担心人工智能基础设施成本上升和经济衰退风险上升，主要科技公司的市值在 8 月份有所下降。【原文：Market values of major tech firms declined in August amid concerns over escalating artificial intelligence infrastructure costs and rising recession risks that would make the stocks particularly vulnerable during a market correction.】

item.title: 美元处于守势，全球决策者松了一口气
item.description: 8 月份，美元对其他主要货币的汇率下跌超过 2%，创下了今年以来的最大单月跌幅，这也为因美元走强而遭受重创的经济体提供了一些宽慰。【原文：The dollar fell more than 2% against other major currencies in August, marking its biggest monthly drop this year and providing some relief to economies that have suffered under the weight of dollar strength.】

item.title: HEDGEFLOW 高盛称对冲基金押注银行、保险和房地产
item.description: 路透社周一看到的高盛公司（Goldman Sachs）在一份说明中写道，截至上周五的一周内，对冲基金继续对银行和金融股进行押注，原因是有报道称银行和金融股裁员，交易量减少。【原文：Hedge funds continued to take bets against bank and financial stocks in the week to Friday, Goldman Sachs wrote in a note seen by Reuters on Monday, amid reported job cuts and reduced dealmaking.】

item.title: 欧元区 8 月份工厂活动陷入困境，PMI 显示
item.description: 周一的一项调查显示，欧元区 8 月份的制造业活动仍陷于萎缩，数据表明，由于需求以今年以来最迅猛的速度下降，复苏可能还有一段距离。【原文：Euro zone manufacturing activity remained mired in contraction in August, a survey showed on Monday, with the data suggesting a recovery could be some way off as demand fell at its sharpest pace this year.】

item.title: 德国制造业采购经理人指数显示德国制造业加速下滑
item.description: 周一的一项调查显示，占欧洲最大经济体约五分之一的德国制造业在 8 月份继续加速下滑。【原文：The downturn in Germany's manufacturing sector, which accounts for about a fifth of Europe's biggest economy, continued to gather pace in August, a survey showed on Monday.】

item.title: 阿尔斯通完成向克诺尔集团出售北美信号业务
item.description: 法国火车制造商阿尔斯通周一表示，已完成以 6.9 亿美元的价格将其北美常规信号业务出售给克诺尔集团。【原文：French train maker Alstom said on Monday it had completed the sale of its North American conventional signalling business to Knorr-Bremse for $690 million.】

item.title: 消息人士称，以 Blackstone 为首的财团接近达成 135 亿美元收购 AirTrunk 的交易
item.description: 一位知情人士周一表示，以 Blackstone 为首的财团即将达成以 200 亿澳元（135.3 亿美元）（包括债务）收购澳大利亚数据中心集团 AirTrunk 的交易。【原文：A consortium led by Blackstone is nearing a deal to acquire Australian data centre group AirTrunk for A$20 billion ($13.53 billion) including debt, a person with knowledge of the situation said on Monday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚零售商伍尔沃斯在分拆三年后退出奋进集团
item.description: 澳大利亚零售商伍尔沃斯（Woolworths）已决定退出酒类连锁店丹-墨菲（Dan Murphy's）和 BWS 瓶装酒商店的所有者，结束了与奋进集团（Endeavour Group）的长期合作关系。【原文：Australian retailer Woolworths has decided to exit the owner of liquor store chain Dan Murphy's and BWS bottle shops, ending its long-standing relationship with Endeavour Group , about three years after spinning it off.】

item.title: 消息人士称，欧洲央行决策者对经济下滑的影响意见不一
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）的政策制定者们对经济增长前景的看法越来越不一致，这一分歧可能会影响数月来的降息辩论，一些政策制定者担心经济衰退，而另一些政策制定者则关注挥之不去的通胀压力。【原文：European Central Bank policymakers are increasingly at odds on the outlook for growth, a rift that could shape the rate cut debate for months with some fearing a recession and others focusing on lingering inflation pressures, sources close to the debate said.】

item.title: 瑞郎利差交易充满避险反弹风险
item.description: 随着投资者转向瑞士法郎，将其作为日本日元套利交易的替代品，瑞士法郎快速反弹的风险始终存在。【原文：As investors turn to the Swiss franc as an alternative to Japan's yen to fund carry trades, the risk of the currency staging one of its rapid rallies remains ever present.】

item.title: 早间竞标预测薪资水平
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 中国监管机构审查阿里巴巴期间的主要事件
item.description: 中国国家市场监督管理总局（SAMR）周五表示，阿里巴巴集团在 2021 年因垄断行为被处以创纪录的 27.5 亿美元罚款后，已完成了为期三年的 "整改"。【原文：China's State Administration of Market Regulation (SAMR) said on Friday that Alibaba Group had completed three years "rectification" following a record $2.75 billion fine levied in 2021 for monopolistic practices.】
